node.name: Makumba
node.shortdescription:
This plugin provides support for developing applications using Makumba web development framework. Some of the features include: Makumba Data Definition editor, JSP content assistant, file wizards etc.

More complete list of features includes:
Makumba Project

  • Makumba Facet that installs required stuff for the project (adds makumba.jar, dataDefinition folder, required filter to web.xml, xtext nature etc.)
  • Makumba Dynamic Web Project configuration for automatic install of required settings
  • New MDD File wizard
  • Builder that automatically validates mdds

MDD Editor

  • Syntax coloring
  • Validation
  • Content assist (CTRL + Space) with some templates (simple & complex fields, validation rules, functions etc.)
  • Open declaration (CTRL Click or F3) for referenced fields/data definitions
  • Find references (CTRL + Shift + G) for fields (looks only for references in other MDDs but not query fragments or JSPs)
  • Rename field (SHIFT + ALT + R) for field names (looks only for references in other MDDs but not query fragments or JSPs)
  • Outline view of the MDD

JSP support

  • New Makumba JSP File template
  • Other makumba templates (currently makumba taglib directive)
  • Content Assist for makumba tag attirbute values
node.body:
This plugin provides support for developing applications using Makumba web development framework. Some of the features include: Makumba Data Definition editor, JSP content assistant, file wizards etc.

More complete list of features includes:
Makumba Project

  • Makumba Facet that installs required stuff for the project (adds makumba.jar, dataDefinition folder, required filter to web.xml, xtext nature etc.)
  • Makumba Dynamic Web Project configuration for automatic install of required settings
  • New MDD File wizard
  • Builder that automatically validates mdds

MDD Editor

  • Syntax coloring
  • Validation
  • Content assist (CTRL + Space) with some templates (simple & complex fields, validation rules, functions etc.)
  • Open declaration (CTRL Click or F3) for referenced fields/data definitions
  • Find references (CTRL + Shift + G) for fields (looks only for references in other MDDs but not query fragments or JSPs)
  • Rename field (SHIFT + ALT + R) for field names (looks only for references in other MDDs but not query fragments or JSPs)
  • Outline view of the MDD

JSP support

  • New Makumba JSP File template
  • Other makumba templates (currently makumba taglib directive)
  • Content Assist for makumba tag attirbute values
